title: Number of revolutions
text: Count the number of times we have gone around the circle to reach the given point within six minutes

title: Number of revolutions
text: What is the maximum number of revolutions that we need to make to reach the given point?

title: Angle
text: Since we traveled less than $$1$$ revolution how can we find the angle corresponding to our given point? Try and figure out which angle would output the given coordinates

title: Angle
text: What angle are we at in degrees with respect to our normal definition of angles when we reach the given point?

title: Final point
text: What is the final amount of time we take to reach this point? (Keep in mind we start north or at $$90$$ degrees or $$\frac{\pi}{2}$$ radians)
